pros: Laid back office culture. Casual dress code. Great vacation time.
cons: Long hours during campaign period (Sept-Dec), no time off allowed during those months.

review_title: Very high tech for non for profit
pros:
* lastest tech
*filled kitchen 
*a lot of fun events
*young team

review_title: Great cause, lovely employees. Be scared of losing your job
pros: Great benefits, great work environment. Lovely employees. Fair pay. A great cause too.
cons: Global changes their mind on strategy every year. This means everyone is constantly afraid of losing their job. I was there for two years and saw 7 people fired. They dont provide warnings. They don't provide action plans. They just let you go. The whole company is in fear of losing their job.

review_title: Amazing people, all motivated and passionate to make a difference in men's health
pros: Great place to work with opportunity to wear multiple hats
cons: Not much room to move up in the organization
